title: Ready Pac Foods, Inc. Recalls Ready to Eat Salad Products Containing Meat and Poultry  Due to Misbranding and an Undeclared Allergen
summary: WASHINGTON, Sept. 23, 2021– Ready Pac Foods, Inc.’s establishments in Swedesboro, NJ and Jackson, GA, are recalling approximately 222,915 pounds of ready-to-eat (RTE) salad products with meat and poultry because the products contain Food and Drug Administration (FDA) regulated salad dressing that has been recalled...
